price: 56 Nous avons produit tous les miracles devant Pharaon qui, refusant obstinément la vérité, a préféré les renier.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
